QuestData.Title: Latent Disease
QuestData.Description: I need plagued grass for an... an experiment, of sorts. Those Argent Crusaders and those infernal Cenarion druids have done too good a job of healing the plaguelands, however... and I can't find proper reagents within a reasonable walking distance.$b$bSome of the local wildlife retain the plague's touch, however. Kill a diseased black bear, then retrieve the grass that grows where its decaying body lies. It's not optimal, but it'll do.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Diseased Black Bears in Western Plaguelands, then loot 20 Plague Tangles that grow near their corpses.
QuestData.CompletionText: Animal tissue holds onto disease so much better than plant tissue, doesn't it?
QuestData.RewardText: Glorious! This is the last bit I need.$b$bActually, stick around, $n. Let me tell you a little bit more about our plan.
